Switch To Advance Calculator - With History

The Calculator App is a versatile tool tailored to meet a variety of calculation needs. It features two distinct modes: Basic and Advanced, catering to users ranging from casual calculators to those needing more precise, rule-based computations.

Key Features:

1. Two Calculation Modes:

Basic Mode: Ideal for quick, straightforward arithmetic operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Focused on simplicity, it excludes complex features, making it perfect for quick tasks.

Advanced Mode: Designed for more detailed calculations, adhering to the BODMAS (Brackets, Orders, Division/Multiplication, Addition/Subtraction) rules. Includes a calculation history feature, allowing users to review and reuse past computations.

2. Calculation History: Available in Advanced Mode, this feature maintains a log of past operations. Users can easily view or retrieve their last few calculations for reference or reuse.

3. BODMAS Rule Compliance: Advanced Mode ensures that calculations follow the proper mathematical order of operations, delivering accurate results for complex expressions.

4. Intuitive User Interface: Simple, clean, and user-friendly design tailored for both basic and advanced users. Easy toggling between Basic and Advanced modes for convenience.

5. Real-Time Results: Both modes provide instant feedback on calculations as values are entered, ensuring a seamless and responsive user experience.
